title: I really like League comics and such but..
body:
Could the text on them be bigger or could we have the choice to make it bigger? It was so small and I couldn't even read half of what Brand said. Idk it just felt strenuous on my eyes. I really had to take my time  instead of reading really fast from excitement y'know?

(edit) I also have 20/20 vision so I can only imagine how hard it must be for people who wear glasses.

replies.body:
Heya!

Thank you for the feedback - we are looking into ways that we could improve the reading experience for desktop in particular on Universe. We want to make sure reading is easy and legible no matter what platform you're on.
A zoom option or an option to make it 1 page per screen instead of 2 would be nice
We do have that feature -- Look in the top right of the page. You should see an icon that looks like two pages and if you click on it it'll transform into single page :)

Hasn't it been done before, maybe in the nami comic, where the panels would animate as you clicked on them?... so the camera could zoom in on each panel individually as you go through them. Once you make it to the end of the page or view panels that are much larger it zooms out. 

I know Overwatch's comics do something like this too.
it is easier to read on mobile

It was kind of small still on my 15 inch monitor. The only real problem was Brand's font (imo).

Comic was absolutely stunning and gorgeous aside from that.
I think you can ctrl-scroll upwards to zoom in.
Really? I had no problem with it on my phone.
My eyesight even with glasses isnt perfect but even so that shit was hard to read

I am relieved seeing this thread because I had the same problem that I couldn't read the comic easily. I have glasses and my eye sight is already not great so when I suddenly couldn't read the comic lines when for a while I was able to read fine I had thought my eye sight had just gotten worse over time without me realizing it.
Had the same problem in my monitor. No zoom in options. i had to open every individua page in a separate tab to be able to zoom in and read it correcly.
zoom in, and itll zoom in to show a full panel per screen
I have glasses - but also one REALLY big screen to read this on, so that's not a big deal for me :)
Yeah it was hard to read it and it was boring to read it too. I didn't finish the whole thing, what a bother.
